description: Mumbai street food context shot with closed or empty stalls, utensils and signboards visible, no people present.
Indoor shot of takeaway food containers placed on a table near a window, natural daylight.
Close-up of uncovered food kept at a stall counter, subtle dust particles visible, highlighting hygiene concerns.
Clean indoor kitchen counter with freshly prepared food, vegetables and utensils neatly arranged.
Organized indoor cafe or restaurant food display area, clean surfaces and professional setup.
Minimal indoor dining table near a window with a glass of water and fresh fruits.
